text: Mona Hammond (born Mavis Chin; 1 January 1931 â€“ 4 July 2022) was a Jamaican- British actress. She was the co-founder of the Talawa Theatre Company. She was best known for her work on British television and played Blossom Jackson in the BBC soap opera EastEnders. Hammond was made an OBE in the 2005 Queen's Birthday Honours List. Hammond died on 4 July 2022, at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Jamaican entertainers Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:British movie actors Category:British stage actors Category:British television actors
title: Mona Hammond
